column2: The overall sections are just adding the values in the other categories together. The stats don't mean one vehicle is strictly better than the other, as the look/feel of the vehicle matters as well.
Check out Reelly Plays's channel on YouTube. We discuss our results and testing methods are his testing helps fill in this spreadsheet as well. :)
"So," you might ask, "what is the same or what makes no difference?" Well, below is a list in no particular order of everything that's the same across all vehicles/options.
Because of not having a fully accurate test at the moment, the Grip stat skews the results for the Sweet Tooth and Merc, so I've given them a value of 7 in that stat for the overall calculations.
Curtesy of ONlocke's testing (https://redd.it/3lpx2d) up to the Supersonic Fury DLC. My own testing confirms his results and I've done my own from the Revenge of the Battles Cars DLC and onwards.
It was discovered that not all vehicles slow down to a stop the same after doing a power slide or freely rolling, so I added another column for it.
I copied the old hit box values from my previous testing to have something as a reference for people. I'll be doing better testing for this in the future.

This is just adding the overall totals for the Maneuvering and the Hit Box together. As testing for the Hit Box isn't completed yet, I added an average "Hit Box" value of 18 to the DeLorean, Scarab and Zippy for now.
